Unlikely to lose in terms of NAV as money market are usually on the safe end of the spectrum. Main risks are1. Yield decrease due to interest rate env change2. Currency risk (USD drop relative to SGD)3. Shock events (see short term yield etfs Mar-May 2020)Comparing to BGF World Technology Fund is like apples to oranges. Low risk (money market) vs high risk (equities)

There is an upcoming charge of S$2 (subject to GST) by 7 April 2024  Sunday for the custody fees charged by Singapore Exchange (SGX). This fee is borne by Syfe if there is at least one SGX trade per quarter. Without trading SGX securities in Q1  you will be charged at the start of Q2.To avoid this charge  we encourage you to make a SGX trade within the next 9 days  before 28 March 2024  Thursday.
